attributes.action: order an investigation into the running of the Elite Ice Hockey League (EIHL).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Members of the board of the EIHL have this week moved to impose a structure which will cause major damage to the sport in this country, effectively managing three (Newcastle, Manchester and Edinburgh) of the remaining nine teams out of the league. This is the latest in a string of incidents which cause concern to ice hockey fans throughout the country. Many are listed here by Edinburgh's Scott Neil. We would appreciate in investigation into the disgraceful nature of these actions.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
